Metadata.Title: CVE-2022-2989 affecting package podman for versions less than 4.1.1-21
Metadata.Description: CVE-2022-2989 affecting package podman for versions less than 4.1.1-21. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package podman is earlier than 4.1.1-21, affected by CVE-2022-2989
